sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { useTranslation } from 'react-i18next'; function Footer() { const { t } = useTranslation(); const currentYear = new Date().getFullYear(); const footerLinks = [ { title: t('footer.about.title'), links: [ { name: t('footer.about.mission'), href: '/about#mission' }, { name: t('footer.about.team'), href: '/about#team' }, { name: t('footer.about.contact'), href: '/contact' } ] }, { title: t('footer.resources.title'), links: [ { name: t('footer.resources.faq'), href: '/faq' }, { name: t('footer.resources.guidelines'), href: '/guidelines' }, { name: t('footer.resources.support'), href: '/support' } ] }, { title: t('footer.legal.title'), links: [ { name: t('footer.legal.privacy'), href: '/privacy' }, { name: t('footer.legal.terms'), href: '/terms' } ] } ]; return (
{/* Background Image with Overlay */}
{/* Content */}
{/* Brand Section */}
Avyakta

{t('footer.description')}

Facebook Twitter Instagram LinkedIn
{/* Links Section */}
{footerLinks.map((section) => (

{section.title}

    {section.links.map((link) => (
  • {link.name}
    • ))}
))}
{/* Bottom Section */}

© {currentYear} Avyakta. All rights reserved. {t('footer.rights')}

Privacy Policy Terms of Service Cookie Policy
); } export default Footer;
